item.description:
Once again, Canada's premier rockers come back to the hub for another great concert.

The Tragically Hip hit the stage at the Orpheum Theater Saturday October 27th and we want to be there, filling the place with signs of the Great White North. Bring your maple leaf, your Canadiens Jerseys, your Eh? T-Shirts and more.

Last time at Avalon was a blast, so lets do it again.

Tickets available on line at Ticket Master. They do sell out so don't wait till the last minute. (Last time folks came from Buffalo and Toronto to see these guys!)

If anyone has some for sale, you can notify folks through the group. (NO GOUGING!)

Looking forward to seeing you all there.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Tragically Hip at the Orpheum
